opinion.posture: IN RE: Nichols, Jeffrey Todd; â€” Plaintiff(s); Applying for Motion to Set Aside Previous Order and to Review on Expedited Basis;
opinion.opinion_text:
Granted. Applicant is eligible to be admitted to the practice of law in Louisiana, subject to a probationary period of one year. Any misconduct during this one year periodWest Page 1135 may terminate the conditional right to practice, or subject applicant to other discipline pursuant to the Rules of Lawyer Disciplinary Enforcement.
TRAYLOR, J. not on panel.Page 1
